title: High comprehensive properties of colorless transparent polyimide films derived from fluorine-containing and ether-containing dianhydride
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32613-32623
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05505E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yan Shi, Jinzhi Hu, Xiaomin Li, Jing Jian, Lili Jiang, Chuanqiang Yin, Yuchun Xi, Kai Huang, Liejun Su, Lang Zhou
Fluorinated colorless transparent polyimide (CPI) films are crucial for flexible displays and wearable devices, but their development is limited by high costs and relatively low mechanical properties.
